name: Baby Loader
description:
Some jobs are so easy even a baby can do them... Like shipment logistics.

Use arrows or WASD and the SPACEBAR to to drag shipment boxes across the bay floor. Be quick because you only have 10 seconds to position 3 boxes before they get locked into place. 

Fit as many boxes in the bay as you can before one of the three garages overflows with boxes.

**FOR MAC DOWNLOAD** Apple puts zipped app into Quarantine you need to use a terminal command to show that the file is fine (it is not damaged) https://help.yoyogames.com/hc/en-us/articles/216753558-Mac-says-apps-damaged-whe...
